requirement_tested: A frontend application that fetches all dynamic data from backend APIs
user_persona: A trader named Alex who wants to view live trading opportunities.
user_goal: To see the latest trading opportunities loaded dynamically from the backend.

narrative_steps.title: Loading Trading Opportunities
narrative_steps.description: Alex opens the trading website and expects to see a list of current trading opportunities fetched from the backend.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The frontend makes GET requests to various endpoints and renders components with dynamic data such as user info and trading opportunities.

requirement_tested: A backend API server that connects to a PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables
user_persona: A developer named Sam deploying the backend service.
user_goal: To ensure the backend connects securely to the PostgreSQL database.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Backend Server
narrative_steps.description: Sam starts the backend server and verifies it connects to the PostgreSQL database using the correct environment variables.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The backend initializes a connection pool to PostgreSQL using DB_HOST=localhost, DB_PORT=5432, DB_USERNAME=myappuser, DB_PASSWORD=myapppassword, DB_NAME=myapp.

requirement_tested: User authentication and authorization system for secure access
user_persona: A new user named Jordan trying to access the trading dashboard.
user_goal: To log in securely and gain access to the trading dashboard.

narrative_steps.title: Logging In
narrative_steps.description: Jordan navigates to the homepage and fills out the login form with valid credentials.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The system sends a POST request to /api/auth/login, authenticates Jordan, and redirects to the dashboard.

narrative_steps.title: Logging Out
narrative_steps.description: After exploring the dashboard, Jordan decides to log out.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A DELETE request is sent to /api/auth/logout, the session cookie is cleared, and Jordan is redirected to the login screen.

requirement_tested: Dashboard for users to browse available trading opportunities
user_persona: An experienced trader named Riley checking for new trading opportunities.
user_goal: To view and refresh the list of available trading opportunities on the dashboard.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Trading Opportunities
narrative_steps.description: Riley logs in and lands on the dashboard where a table of trading opportunities is displayed.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The dashboard automatically fetches and displays the latest trading opportunities from /api/trading/opportunities.

narrative_steps.title: Refreshing Data
narrative_steps.description: Riley notices the data might be stale and clicks the refresh button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The dashboard re-fetches data from the API and updates the table without reloading the entire page.

requirement_tested: Interface for placing bids and executing trades in real-time
user_persona: A competitive trader named Taylor looking to place a bid on a promising opportunity.
user_goal: To place a bid and execute a trade in real-time.

narrative_steps.title: Placing a Bid
narrative_steps.description: Taylor finds an attractive trading opportunity and clicks the 'Place Bid' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A modal opens prompting for a bid amount. After submission, a POST request is made to /api/bids/place and a confirmation toast is shown.

narrative_steps.title: Executing Trade
narrative_steps.description: Taylor's bid gets accepted, and the system prompts to confirm execution.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A POST request is made to /api/trades/execute, and the UI updates instantly with the outcome.

requirement_tested: Trading account management section for users to monitor balances and positions
user_persona: A cautious investor named Morgan wanting to review their account status.
user_goal: To view account balance and current positions.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating to Account Summary
narrative_steps.description: Morgan clicks on the account tab to view their financial standing.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The system loads a detailed view of Morgan's portfolio, including account balance, open positions, and performance metrics.

requirement_tested: Order history page displaying past transactions and trade outcomes
user_persona: A meticulous trader named Casey reviewing past trades.
user_goal: To filter and view past transactions by date range.

narrative_steps.title: Applying Filters
narrative_steps.description: Casey visits the order history page and applies a date range filter to narrow down transactions.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The system updates the query parameters to /api/orders/history and renders a filtered list of transactions.

requirement_tested: Real-time updates for bid changes and trade executions
user_persona: An active trader named Avery monitoring live market changes.
user_goal: To receive real-time updates on bid changes and trade executions.

narrative_steps.title: Receiving Live Updates
narrative_steps.description: While browsing, Avery receives a notification about a new bid update.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A flash alert appears briefly at the top of the screen indicating the update and dismisses automatically.

requirement_tested: Search and filter functionality for trading opportunities
user_persona: A focused trader named Quinn searching for specific assets.
user_goal: To find specific trading opportunities using search and filters.

narrative_steps.title: Searching Assets
narrative_steps.description: Quinn types a keyword into the search bar to find relevant opportunities.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The table dynamically filters results in real-time as Quinn types.

narrative_steps.title: Applying Filters
narrative_steps.description: Quinn selects a filter option to refine the results further.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The displayed opportunities update immediately based on the selected filter.

requirement_tested: Responsive web design with lemon chiffon background and chocolate-colored components
user_persona: A mobile user named Pat accessing the trading site on a phone.
user_goal: To navigate the site comfortably on a small screen with consistent styling.

narrative_steps.title: Resizing Viewport
narrative_steps.description: Pat resizes the browser window to simulate a mobile experience.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The layout adapts smoothly, adjusting fonts, spacing, and navigation menus based on viewport width, maintaining lemon chiffon background and chocolate components.

requirement_tested: User profile settings page for personal information and preferences
user_persona: A detail-oriented user named Robin updating personal settings.
user_goal: To update profile information and save changes.

narrative_steps.title: Updating Profile
narrative_steps.description: Robin navigates to the profile settings page and modifies personal information.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The updated information is submitted to /api/users/profile/update, and the UI reflects the saved state.

requirement_tested: Notifications system for trade confirmations and bid updates
user_persona: A busy trader named Drew checking for important alerts.
user_goal: To view and dismiss a notification about a recent trade.

narrative_steps.title: Opening Notifications
narrative_steps.description: Drew clicks the notification bell icon to check for alerts.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A dropdown panel appears showing recent notifications fetched from /api/notifications/feed.

narrative_steps.title: Dismissing Alert
narrative_steps.description: Drew dismisses a specific alert by clicking on it.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The alert is marked as read and removed from the dropdown list temporarily.

requirement_tested: Admin panel for managing trading listings and user accounts
user_persona: An administrator named Lee overseeing the platform.
user_goal: To access the admin panel and manage platform resources.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Admin Panel
narrative_steps.description: Lee tries to access the restricted admin panel to manage listings.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Lee is redirected to a protected route where JWT token claims are verified before granting access.

requirement_tested: `package.json` configured with `install:all` script to install frontend and backend dependencies
user_persona: A developer named Kai setting up the project for the first time.
user_goal: To install all frontend and backend dependencies with a single command.

narrative_steps.title: Installing Dependencies
narrative_steps.description: Kai runs the install script to set up the development environment.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Two child processes start installing node_modules in client/ and server/ folders concurrently, completing together.

requirement_tested: `package.json` configured with `dev` script to start frontend and backend concurrently
user_persona: A developer named Jan starting the development environment.
user_goal: To launch both frontend and backend servers for local testing.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Development Servers
narrative_steps.description: Jan runs the dev script to begin working on the project locally.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Both frontend and backend development servers boot up concurrently, exposing the frontend on port 3000 and backend on port 5000.
